bibl.author: Whitman, Walt
bibl.title: [2d Annex]
bibl.orgName: The Charles E. Feinberg Collection of the Papers of Walt Whitman, 1839-1919, Library of Congress, Washington, DC.
bibl.note: Transcribed from digital images of the original.
The verso consists of an unfolded envelope addressed to Walt Whitman and postmarked from New York on August 30, 1889.
